title: UMM..Missed to select champ twice..now banned for 30min from queue?
body:
RITO,
Do you want me to quit playing your game altogether?
I spend money on this game you know.
I wasn't able to click the button and wasn't able to choose a good champ because of the enemy counters to my main..and Im banned from playing for 30 FUKGINGG MINUTES???!!??

EDIT: Who's brilliant idea was it to make the dodge timer 30 min on the 2nd (accidental) dodge??! SACK that POS

BYE

replies.body:
If you don't select a champion in time, you get hit with dodge penalties. This is normal.

The other people, who are also paying customers, don't want to have to sit through extra queues before getting into a game.
Yeah..so would there not be a logical conclusion that I not be banned away for 30min so more people will be able to play fking games if I am able to play one?

No, cause these rules have been there for a long ass time to stop people from constantly dodging because they didn't like the team or didn't get to the champ they wanted 100 over nonstop.
Next time dont watch porn in champ select.Its your fault.Ban deserved.
